snippet: MILLER--Esther, of Walnut Creek, CA died peacefully at home March 4, 2016 at age 92. A partner in the entertainment-oriented CPA firm of Bernstein and Friedman, she was active in the ASWA NYC chapter. Her kind and gentle nature was appreciated by all and will be greatly missed. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MILLER--Esther, of Walnut Creek, CA died peacefully at home March 4, 2016 at age 92. A partner in the entertainment-oriented CPA firm of Bernstein and Friedman, she was active in the ASWA NYC chapter. Her kind and gentle nature was appreciated by all and will be greatly missed. 1/3
